availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: QueryDomainList
If set to 1: verbose output
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned

Parameter by which the output will be sorted.Must be one of the following:DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, DOMAINSUBCLASS, DOMAINSUBCLASSDESC, USER, USERDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC, UPDATEDDATE, UPDATEDDATEDESC, EXPIRATIONDATE, EXPIRATIONDATEDESC REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATE, REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATEDESC, PAIDUNTILDATE, PAIDUNTILDATEDESC, STATUS, STATUSDESC, REGISTRAR, REGISTRARDESC
Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL
If set to 1 only unique results will be returned
Additional properties to be returned can be specified here. Currently only supported value is RENEWALPRICE which returns additional information about the upcoming renewal of a domain name
Only show domains which match the pattern specified here
Only shows domains with a subclass specified here (syntax: COM. [beware the "." at the END of the TLD])
Only show domains which have a owner contact handle assigned that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have a administrative contact handle assigned that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have a technical contact handle assigned that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have a billing contact handle assigned that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have nameservers assigned that match the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have one of the nameservers specified here assigned
Only show domains with a status that matches the pattern specified here
Only show domains which have a transfer lock enabled (1) or disabled (0)
Minimal creation date of returned domains
Maximal creation date of returned domains
Minimal updated date of returned domains
Maximal updated date of returned domains
Minimal expiration date of returned domains
Maximal expiration date of returned domains
Minimal paid until date of returned domains
Maximal paid until date of returned domains
Minimal registration expiration date of returned domains
Maximal registration expiration date of returned domains
Show only domains with a certain renewal mode.Can beEXPIRE, DELETE or RENEW
Show only domains which belong to a certain domain repository
Show only domains which are assigned to a certain user
Set to 1 to only show domains which have a trustee (local presence service) activated
Set to 1 to only show domains which have the Whois Trustee Service enabled
Set to 1 to only show domains which have the Whois Trustee Lite Service enabled
Set to 1 to only show domains which have the .MOBI Instant Mobilizer enabled
